## Description

Evaluate spatial location input


## Usage

```r
evaluate_spatial_locations(spatial_locs, cores = 1)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`spatial_locs`     |     spatial locations to evaluate
`cores`     |     how many cores to use


## Value

data.table
